aboutPage.title: About Servify
aboutPage.subtitle: We're on a mission to organize the unorganized service sector, making quality repairs and maintenance accessible to everyone across India.
aboutPage.mission_desc: To create a trusted, technology-driven platform that connects customers with verified local service providers, ensuring quality, transparency, and fair pricing while empowering skilled workers in the unorganized sector.
aboutPage.vision_desc: To become India's most trusted multi-domain service platform, reaching every corner of the country with inclusive access through voice, multi-language support, and technology that works for everyone.
aboutPage.values_subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do at Servify.
aboutPage.value_trust_desc: We believe in building trust through complete transparency in pricing, service quality, and vendor verification.
aboutPage.value_inclusive_desc: We design for everyone – from tech-savvy urban users to rural communities and those with limited digital literacy.
aboutPage.value_innovation_desc: We leverage AI, blockchain, and modern technology to solve real-world problems in the unorganized service sector.
aboutPage.value_empowerment_desc: We empower local service providers with tools, visibility, and fair opportunities to grow their businesses.
aboutPage.problem_1: Unorganized service sector with no single platform for multiple domains
aboutPage.problem_2: No verification of vendors, leading to inconsistent quality and fraud
aboutPage.problem_3: No transparent repair history or warranty tracking
aboutPage.problem_4: Rural and illiterate populations excluded due to language and digital barriers
aboutPage.problem_6: No real-time tracking or communication with service providers
aboutPage.team_subtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to transforming the service industry.
aboutPage.cta_desc: Whether you need a service or want to offer your skills, Servify is here for you.

howItWorksPage.title: How Servify Works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: From booking to completion, we've made every step simple, transparent, and secure.
howItWorksPage.step1_desc: Tell us what needs fixing using text, images, or voice. Our AI analyzes your input to understand the issue and provide an initial diagnosis.
howItWorksPage.step2_desc: Browse through verified service providers filtered by location, ratings, expertise, and price. View detailed profiles and customer reviews.
howItWorksPage.step3_desc: Book a convenient time slot and track your service provider in real-time on the map. Get status updates at every step.
howItWorksPage.step4_desc: Your expert arrives and completes the service. All work is logged transparently with photos and notes for your records.
howItWorksPage.step5_desc: Pay securely through the app using multiple payment options. Your payment is released to the vendor only after service completion.
howItWorksPage.step6_desc: Share your experience to help others make informed decisions. Your feedback helps maintain quality across the platform.
howItWorksPage.step1_detail1: Upload photos or videos of the issue
howItWorksPage.step1_detail2: Use voice input in your preferred language

howItWorksPage.feature_chat_desc: Communicate directly with your service provider.
